alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Garfield; Kingfisher (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 13 at 2:28AM CST until December 13 at 3:15AM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Kingfisher County in central Oklahoma... Northeastern Blaine County in northwestern Oklahoma... South central Garfield County in northern Oklahoma... * Until 315 AM CST. * At 228 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hitchcock, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hennessey, Waukomis, Dover, Hitchcock, Loyal, Bison, Omega and Lacey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
